submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        mapp=defaultdict(list)
        values=[]
        
        for i in range(len(nums)//2):
            a=nums[i]
            b=nums[len(nums)-i-1]
            diff=abs(a-b)
            value=max(a,b,k-a,k-b)
            mapp[diff].append(value)
            values.append(value)
        res=len(nums)
        values.sort()
        
        for diff,v in mapp.items():
            ct=bisect_left(values,diff)
            ct=ct*2+(len(nums)//2-ct)
            
            for value in v:
                ct-=2 if value<diff else 1
            res=min(res,ct)
        return res
